MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Ash Road, Cherry Tree Drive and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team have managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further excavations required, and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:57PM on 22nd February 2021
